title: AVENGERS - EARTH'S MIGHTIEST HEROES 002 (2012) (hybrid) (PeteThe
description:
Marvel Universe Avengers: Earth's Mightiest Heroes #2

Published: May 09, 2012
Added to Marvel Unlimited: April 08, 2013

Two breathtaking tales of THE AVENGERS: EARTH'S MIGHTIEST HEROES by Chris Yost, the head writer of the hit animated series. Lightning striking stone! Thor and Iron Man vs. Grey Gargoyle! Plus: It's might vs. bright when Hulk, Wasp and Hawkeye take on Marvel's most malicious Mensa member: the Wizard!

------

One more! Credit to PeteThePIPster (who does the absolutely massive Complete Marvel Chronology torrent project at h33t) for this scan, and to shipjolly who posted this in one of his Hitlist Week torrents.

And big thanks muckymucks, for the torrent of the other back issues!

Still missing 12 issues. And I bet people would enjoy a set of MU: Ultimate Spidey, too. But it is what it is! --- 4 or 5 different scan groups will release the next Scott Lobdell Masterpiece, but these relatively insignificant (and somewhat mediocre) titles have big gaps... --STF
